name: PDFDocumentAttribute
desc: A structure that specifies document attributes.

items.name: static let authorAttribute: PDFDocumentAttribute
items.desc: An optional text string containing the name of the author of the document.

items.name: static let creationDateAttribute: PDFDocumentAttribute
items.desc: An optional text string containing the document’s creation date.

items.name: static let creatorAttribute: PDFDocumentAttribute
items.desc: An optional text string containing the name of the application that created the document content.

items.name: static let keywordsAttribute: PDFDocumentAttribute
items.desc: An optional array of text strings containing keywords for the document.

items.name: static let modificationDateAttribute: PDFDocumentAttribute
items.desc: An optional text string containing the document’s last-modified date.

items.name: static let producerAttribute: PDFDocumentAttribute
items.desc: An optional text string containing the name of the application that produced the PDF data for the document.

items.name: static let subjectAttribute: PDFDocumentAttribute
items.desc: An optional text string containing a description of the subject of the document.

items.name: static let titleAttribute: PDFDocumentAttribute
items.desc: An optional text string containing the title of the document.
